Class RecipeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.web.RecipeController

  • @Controller
public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Nils Sommer This is the Controller which processes all recipe requests.

                value="/recipe/adddata")
public java.lang.String addRecipe(@ModelAttribute(value="recipe")

                                        @RequestParam(value="ids",required=false)
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)

        Parameters:
        recipe - to add
        ids - of the images that belong to the recipe
        Returns:
        the view of the newly created recipe
